name: Kyan Kyan Collection
overview: Kyan Kyan Collection is similar in concept to an earlier game with the same name, being a strip Daifugō card game. However, the opponents are different, and rather than selecting them from the main menu the player faces them one after the other in a linear fashion. The graphics are also completely different, and the girls' undressing scenes are animated. This release also has a much lower difficulty level.
